Name: Plik
Overview:
DESCRIPTION
Plik is a scalable & friendly temporary file upload system (Wetransfer like) in golang.

Live demo:
https://plik.root.gg/

NOTES
• Run the following cmds before building the container: 'mkdir -m777 /mnt/user/appdata/plik', 'curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SmartPhoneLover/unraid-docker-templates/main/templates/dependencies/plik/plikd.cfg'.
• Plik uses an embbeded database (SQLite) by default, but you can use an external database (MySQL, PostgreSQL) if decided. Check the 'plikd.cfg' file to know more.
• Plik has an HTTP API to manage the upload and get files. Check the GitHub repo to know more.
